      Annotates modifier cues and scope in the given corpus using dependency trees.

      void ModDetect_SVM.annotateSVM(java.util.ArrayList<Tweet> corpus)
      Annotates negation scopes using three binary SVM, one for each modifier type.
      private void Evaluation.calcPosNegModifier(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String[]> handAnnotations, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Tweet> handAnnotatedTweets)
      Calculates the true positives, true negatives, false positives and false negatives for each modifier This evaluation method not only considers if a token is modified correctly, but also if it is modified by the correct modifier token
      private void Evaluation.calcPosNegModifierSimple(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String[]> handAnnotations, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Tweet> handAnnotatedTweets)
      Calculates the true positives, true negatives, false positives and false negatives for each modifier The 'simple' evaluation method only considers if a token is modified correctly, but not if it is modified by the correct modifier token.
      private int[] Evaluation.countTweetsPerEmo(java.util.ArrayList<Tweet> corpus)
      This method counts the number of Tweets for each basic emotion.
